DOC.brief_title: A Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety MOR208 With Bendamustine ( BEN ) Versus Rituximab ( RTX ) With BEN Adult Patients With Relapsed Refractory Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma ( DLBCL )
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , two-arm , multicentre , open-label phase II/III efficacy safety study MOR208 combination BEN versus RTX combination BEN give adult patient relapse refractory least one three prior systemic therapy fail , candidate HDC ASCT , thus exhaust therapeutic option demonstrate clinical benefit . At least one prior therapy line must include CD20-targeted therapy .
